detectors.description:
Token (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DFY.sol#2-13) has the function that can only return the default value
	Default value functions:
	- Token.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DFY.sol#3)
	- Token.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DFY.sol#4)
	- Token.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DFY.sol#5)
	- Token.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DFY.sol#6)
	- Token.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DFY.sol#7)
	- Token.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DFY.sol#8)
detectors.markdown:

	- [Token.allowance(address,address)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DFY.sol#L8)

detectors.description:
StandardToken.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DFY.sol#15-22) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- balances[msg.sender] -= _value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DFY.sol#17)
	- balances[_to] += _value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DFY.sol#18)

detectors.description:
DFY.fallback() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DFY.sol#70-78) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- totalEthInWei = totalEthInWei + msg.value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DFY.sol#71)
	- amount = msg.value * unitsOneEthCanBuy (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DFY.sol#72)
	- balances[fundsWallet] = balances[fundsWallet] - amount (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DFY.sol#74)
	- balances[msg.sender] = balances[msg.sender] + amount (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DFY.sol#75)
detectors.markdown:
[DFY.fallback()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DFY.sol#L70-L78) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- [totalEthInWei = totalEthInWei + msg.value](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DFY.sol#L71)
	- [amount = msg.value * unitsOneEthCanBuy](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DFY.sol#L72)
	- [balances[fundsWallet] = balances[fundsWallet] - amount](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DFY.sol#L74)
	- [balances[msg.sender] = balances[msg.sender] + amount](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DFY.sol#L75)

detectors.description:
Deprecated standard detected ! _spender.call(bytes4(bytes32(sha3()(receiveApproval(address,uint256,address,bytes)))),msg.sender,_value,this,_extraData) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DFY.sol#82):
	- Usage of "sha3()" should be replaced with "keccak256()"
